ability.name: Rabbit Out of a Hat
ability.description: * Place one card of each suit on Rabbit Out of a Hat * Cards sitting on Rabbit Out of a Hat remain there. * When all four cards are present: * Discard the lowest three cards * Draw the the highest ranked card into hand, and, for the rest of the turn, treat it as The Magician (for example, to trigger a spell).
ability.flavor: A trick isn't that impressive on it's own: line up a few more, and you've got a show.
